name: Climp
description:
Its a platformer but you have a really special kind of arm ,which can be used to climb and gain 3 dimensional movement!!!

This will be a early demo kinda thing. I am planning on working on this game But for now it has only 3 levels

You can give me feedback through this form : https://forms.gle/hwuXpsaU9bqJrU8W6

Controls:

 The controls are explain in the game itself

You can also jump by left clicking, Kinda like grab the air

 NOTE: Your "mouse point position" is important while left clicking

Also did you get the title of the game "Climp"(I was really stuck on naming the game ,So....)Lol

Also follow me here to get updates 

Here is my IG too: https://www.instagram.com/dark_angel_60/
